pkgmetadata.longdescription: Vega Strike is an Open Source 3D Action-Space-Sim that lets you trade, fight, and explore in a vast universe. The vegastrike branch contains the game source code.

use.flag: Enables support for system dev-libs/boost instead of included one. Recommended.
Uses x11-libs/gtk+ allowing graphical configuration with vssetup. Recommended.
Enables preliminary support for SMP configuration. Most probably doesn't have any effect at the moment.
Builds the Vega Strike mesh tool. Presumably used by starship designers for converting 3D models. Optional.
Builds the Vega Strike server. Optional.
